sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Sets nlu utterance source column to manual</description>
        <name>NLU utterance source cloumn</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
    if (pm.isZboot()) {
        return;
    }


    var utteranceGr = new GlideRecord("sys_nlu_utterance");
    utteranceGr.addNullQuery('source');
    utteranceGr.setValue('source', 'manual');
    utteranceGr.updateMultiple();
    gs.info('NLU Utterance: updated utterance source field to manual');

})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-08-05 11:04:33</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>9ca072f65349d110ec1fddeeff7b12a1</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>NLU utterance source cloumn</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="NLU Workbench - Core" source="com.glide.nlu">302438683c31311068bcf327dfe37f2f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_9ca072f65349d110ec1fddeeff7b12a1</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-10-07 08:07:11</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
